title: Clement hails ´dominant´ Rangers after easing past Aberdeen
description: Philippe Clement praised Rangers’ dominant performance as they ran out 3-0 winners over Aberdeen on Wednesday. Clement has come under pressure in recent weeks after Rangers fell further behind leaders Celtic, but they have now secured back-to-back wins to move 13 points behind Brendan Rodgers’ side. Hamza Igamane got the ball rolling for the hosts […] The post Clement hails ´dominant´ Rangers after easing past Aberdeen appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Fernandes lauds Zirkzee´s redemption arc following FA Cup heroics
description: Manchester United captain Bruno Fernandes is pleased for Joshua Zirkzee, whose redemption arc was completed after scoring the winning penalty against Arsenal in the FA Cup on Sunday. That moment came just two weeks after Zirkzee was hooked on 33 minutes in United’s 2-0 defeat to Newcastle United at the end of November.
